verses.plain: Every friend saith, I am his friend also: but there is a friend, which is only a friend in name.

tokens.t: Every friend saith, I am his friend also: but there is a friend, which is only a friend in name.

verses.plain: Is it not a grief unto death, when a companion and friend is turned to an enemy?

tokens.t: Is it not a grief unto death, when a companion and friend is turned to an enemy?

verses.plain: O wicked imagination, whence camest thou in to cover the earth with deceit?

tokens.t: O wicked imagination, whence camest thou in to cover the earth with deceit?

verses.plain: There is a companion, which rejoiceth in the prosperity of a friend, but in the time of trouble will be against him.

tokens.t: There is a companion, which rejoiceth in the prosperity of a friend, but in the time of trouble will be against him.

verses.plain: There is a companion, which helpeth his friend for the belly, and taketh up the buckler against the enemy.

tokens.t: There is a companion, which helpeth his friend for the belly, and taketh up the buckler against the enemy.

verses.plain: Forget not thy friend in thy mind, and be not unmindful of him in thy riches.

tokens.t: Forget not thy friend in thy mind, and be not unmindful of him in thy riches.

verses.plain: Every counsellor extolleth counsel; but there is some that counselleth for himself.

tokens.t: Every counsellor extolleth counsel; but there is some that counselleth for himself.

verses.plain: Beware of a counsellor, and know before what need he hath; for he will counsel for himself; lest he cast the lot upon thee,

tokens.t: Beware of a counsellor, and know before what need he hath; for he will counsel for himself; lest he cast the lot upon thee,

verses.plain: And say unto thee, Thy way is good: and afterward he stand on the other side, to see what shall befall thee.

tokens.t: And say unto thee, Thy way is good: and afterward he stand on the other side, to see what shall befall thee.

verses.plain: Consult not with one that suspecteth thee: and hide thy counsel from such as envy thee.

tokens.t: Consult not with one that suspecteth thee: and hide thy counsel from such as envy thee.

verses.plain: Neither consult with a woman touching her of whom she is jealous; neither with a coward in matters of war; nor with a merchant concerning exchange; nor with a buyer of selling; nor with an envious man of thankfulness; nor with an unmerciful man touching kindness; nor with the slothful for any work; nor with an hireling for a year of finishing work; nor with an idle servant of much business: hearken not unto these in any matter of counsel.

tokens.t: Neither consult with a woman touching her of whom she is jealous; neither with a coward in matters of war; nor with a merchant concerning exchange; nor with a buyer of selling; nor with an envious man of thankfulness; nor with an unmerciful man touching kindness; nor with the slothful for any work; nor with an hireling for a year of finishing work; nor with an idle servant of much business: hearken not unto these in any matter of counsel.

verses.plain: But be continually with a godly man, whom thou knowest to keep the commandments of the Lord, whose, mind is according to thy mind, and will sorrow with thee, if thou shalt miscarry.

tokens.t: But be continually with a godly man, whom thou knowest to keep the commandments of the Lord, whose, mind is according to thy mind, and will sorrow with thee, if thou shalt miscarry.

verses.plain: And let the counsel of thine own heart stand: for there is no man more faithful unto thee than it.

tokens.t: And let the counsel of thine own heart stand: for there is no man more faithful unto thee than it.

verses.plain: For a man’s mind is sometime wont to tell him more than seven watchmen, that sit above in an high tower.

tokens.t: For a man’s mind is sometime wont to tell him more than seven watchmen, that sit above in an high tower.

verses.plain: And above all this pray to the most High, that he will direct thy way in truth.

tokens.t: And above all this pray to the most High, that he will direct thy way in truth.

verses.plain: Let reason go before every enterprize, and counsel before every action.

tokens.t: Let reason go before every enterprize, and counsel before every action.

verses.plain: The countenance is a sign of changing of the heart.

tokens.t: The countenance is a sign of changing of the heart.

verses.plain: Four manner of things appear: good and evil, life and death: but the tongue ruleth over them continually.

tokens.t: Four manner of things appear: good and evil, life and death: but the tongue ruleth over them continually.

verses.plain: There is one that is wise and teacheth many, and yet is unprofitable to himself.

tokens.t: There is one that is wise and teacheth many, and yet is unprofitable to himself.

verses.plain: There is one that sheweth wisdom in words, and is hated: he shall be destitute of all food.

tokens.t: There is one that sheweth wisdom in words, and is hated: he shall be destitute of all food.

verses.plain: For grace is not given, him from the Lord, because he is deprived of all wisdom.

tokens.t: For grace is not given, him from the Lord, because he is deprived of all wisdom.

verses.plain: Another is wise to himself; and the fruits of understanding are commendable in his mouth.

tokens.t: Another is wise to himself; and the fruits of understanding are commendable in his mouth.

verses.plain: A wise man instructeth his people; and the fruits of his understanding fail not.

tokens.t: A wise man instructeth his people; and the fruits of his understanding fail not.

verses.plain: A wise man shall be filled with blessing; and all they that see him shall count him happy.

tokens.t: A wise man shall be filled with blessing; and all they that see him shall count him happy.

verses.plain: The days of the life of man may be numbered: but the days of Israel are innumerable.

tokens.t: The days of the life of man may be numbered: but the days of Israel are innumerable.

verses.plain: A wise man shall inherit glory among his people, and his name shall be perpetual.

tokens.t: A wise man shall inherit glory among his people, and his name shall be perpetual.

verses.plain: My son, prove thy soul in thy life, and see what is evil for it, and give not that unto it.

tokens.t: My son, prove thy soul in thy life, and see what is evil for it, and give not that unto it.

verses.plain: For all things are not profitable for all men, neither hath every soul pleasure in every thing.

tokens.t: For all things are not profitable for all men, neither hath every soul pleasure in every thing.

verses.plain: Be not unsatiable in any dainty thing, nor too greedy upon meats:

tokens.t: Be not unsatiable in any dainty thing, nor too greedy upon meats:

verses.plain: For excess of meats bringeth sickness, and surfeiting will turn into choler.

tokens.t: For excess of meats bringeth sickness, and surfeiting will turn into choler.

verses.plain: By surfeiting have many perished; but he that taketh heed prolongeth his life.

tokens.t: By surfeiting have many perished; but he that taketh heed prolongeth his life.
